task_6.description: Place the green tissue under the blue paper cup
task_6.initial_setup: The green tissue is crumpled and lying flat on the left side of the table. The blue paper cup is upright on the right side, 25 cm from the edge. A red plastic cup is tilted and resting on its side near the center.
task_6.final_state: The green tissue is flat and positioned directly under the blue cup, which is now tilted slightly to accommodate it. The red cup is upright on the far left corner.
